      • withAbsoluteDocumentOffset

        public CheckInformationBuilder<DocumentType> withAbsoluteDocumentOffset(int absoluteDocumentOffset)
        Specified by:
        withAbsoluteDocumentOffset in interface CheckInformationBuilder<DocumentType extends Document>
        Parameters:
        absoluteDocumentOffset - The absolute offset of a selection in the original document. In GUI mode this will be used to calculate an absolute offset.
        Returns:
        The CheckInformationBuilder for chaining.
        Note: in BlockDocuments the mapping is done via: DocumentPartMapping.getOriginalDocumentParts(com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.extraction.documents.block.Range) .

      • withServerSideXmlExtraction

        public CheckInformationBuilder<DocumentType> withServerSideXmlExtraction(boolean isUseServerSideXmlExtraction)
        Description copied from interface: CheckInformationBuilder
        Set to XML to use server-side XML extraction. Requires that the language server is configured to support server-side XML extraction. Also the FileFormat of the Document should match.
        Specified by:
        withServerSideXmlExtraction in interface CheckInformationBuilder<DocumentType extends Document>
        Parameters:
        isUseServerSideXmlExtraction - whether the server should expect an XML document and do XML extraction on the server-side
        Returns:
        an instance of the same CheckSettingsBuilder to allow chaining
